item.title: Caching: My lessons on it
item.description: Caching is a cheap way to scale a system’s performance in very less time. Being cheap and easy to implement over a system it also brings some problems such as invalidation and infrastructure for setting up the cache itself. Here I plan to talk about some lessons on caching that I’ve learnt in a few months. Philosophy of Caching The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting it - Sun Tzu
